content: prev row use 3 5 mm e hook for squares use 3 mm hook for border row only to the ch1sp 3 double_crochet chain 1 3 double_crochet in ch1sp 3 double_crochet in gap between each 3-double_crochet group of prev row to the next ch1sp 3 double_crochet in ch1sp turn 18 3-double_crochet groups single_crochet in the end of the round counts as last ch1sp chain 2 in the beginning counts as first double_crochet row 10 chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet 3 double_crochet in gap between each 3 double_crochet group of prev row to the ch1sp 3 double_crochet chain 1 3 double_crochet in ch1sp 3 double_crochet in gap between each 3-double_crochet round 1 make a magic_ring chain 3 2 double_crochet in ring *chain 1 3 double_crochet in ring* 3 times group of prev row to the end double_crochet in top of beginning chain 2 turn 18 3-double_crochet single_crochet in top of beginning chain 3 turn 4 3-double_crochet groups groups 2 double_crochet round 2 chain 2 2 double_crochet in first ch1sp * 3 double_crochet chain 1 3 double_crochet in next ch1sp* 3 times 3 row 11 move with slip_stitch between last double_crochet and 3-double_crochet group chain 2 2 double_crochet in same double_crochet in last ch1sp single_crochet in top of beginning ch3 turn 8 3-double_crochet groups space 3 double_crochet in gap between each 3 double_crochet-group of prev row to the ch1sp 3 double_crochet chain 1 3 double_crochet in ch1sp 3 double_crochet in gap between 3-double_crochet group of prev row to the end 3 round 3 chain 2 2 double_crochet in first ch1sp *3 double_crochet in the gap between 3-double_crochet group of double_crochet between last 3-double_crochet group and beginning chain 3 of prev row turn 20 3-double_crochet prev round 3 double_crochet ch1 3 double_crochet in next ch1sp* 3 times 3 double_crochet in the gap between groups 3-double_crochet group of prev round 3 double_crochet in ch1sp single_crochet in top of beginning chain 3 turn 12 3-double_crochet groups cut the yarn and fasten_off for size 3-6 month square measures 7 /18 5 cm round 4 chain 2 2 double_crochet in first ch1sp *3 double_crochet in each gap between 3-double_crochet group of repeat row 10 and 11 alternately until square reach prev round to the next ch1sp 3 double_crochet ch1 3 double_crochet in ch1sp* 3 times 3 double_crochet in each gap between 3-double_crochet group of prev round to the last ch1sp 3 double_crochet in ch1sp single_crochet in babies and kids 7 5 /19 5 cm 8 3 /21 5 cm 8 7 /22 5 cm 9 /23 5 cm top of beginning chain 3 turn 16 3-double_crochet groups adults 9 8 /25cm 10 3 /26 cm 10 8 /27cm now your square measures 3 1 /8 cm make 2 squares do not cut the yarn after second square is finished repeat round 4 four times more 8 rounds total or until your square measures 5 9
